welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Castelfranco Veneto, a charming city known for its beautiful medieval walls and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its rich history and vibrant culture. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, with all necessary facilities for departing and arriving passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at S. Angelo Airport, mainly used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Trissino Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Trissino Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: No password required, but may require registration.
